title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 152.10 - Withholding of increase
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 152.10 - Withholding of increase

State Regulations

Notwithstanding the foregoing provisions of this Part, any
increase in compensation provided by this Part may be withheld in whole or in
part from any officer or employee when, in the opinion of the Director of the

Budget, such increase is not warranted or is not appropriate. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
152.10

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
